\begin{algorithm}[H]
  \Repeat{sample is accepted}{
    Generate $Y \sim \mathrm{Uniform}(-\pi, \pi)$\;
    Generate $U \sim \mathrm{Uniform}(0, 1)$\;
    \If{$U \leq e^{\kappa(\cos(Y) - 1)}$}{
      Accept $Y$ as a sample\;
    }
  }
  \caption{Rejection sampling for the von Mises distribution}
\end{algorithm}
